description.value: Your control over your ghostly form grows. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Advanced Undead Benefits] and can interact with physical objects, with limits. You can attempt Strengthâ€‘based skill checks against physical creatures and objects. You can Interact with physical objects, but the action has no effect unless you succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20] or @Check[type:thievery|dc:20] check.
